My Clinical Question (condition: hyperparathyroidism): ***

My most current assessment of this problem can be found in the note dated {Today/***}.

required_info: Has the patient ever had hypercalcemia?
How much calcium is the patient taking?
How much vitamin D is the patient taking?
How long has the PTH been elevated?
Does the patient have a history of fractures, low bone density, kidney stones?
Does the patient have any renal or gastrointestinal issues?
Does the patient have weight loss or other signs of malabsorption?
Has the patient ever had testing for celiac disease?

optional: 24-hour Urine Calcium and Creatinine (if 25 OH-vitamin D is normal)
